page.title: 04THE POWER STATION
page.content: THE POWER STATION IS ONE OF THE LARGEST OF ITS KIND IN EUROPE.IT IS A COAL FIRED STATION WITH 6 COOLING TOWERS.ORIGINALLY THE STATION HAD DIFFICULTY FINDING STAFF.MANY PEOPLE MOVED FROM THE NORTH INCLDUING NEWCASTLE, FIRSTLY LODGING IN HOSTELS AND FINALLY SETTLING IN DIDCOT -SO NOW THE WHOLE WORKFORCE IS LOCAL.WORKING CONDITIONS ARE GOOD AND ARE CHECKED BY SAFETY REGULATIONS.THERE IS A PAY ALLOWANCE FOR WORKING IN SOME DIFFICULT CONDITIONS.POLLUTION HAS CAUSED MUCH CONCERN AND MANY TESTS ARE NOW BEING CARRIED OUT FOR ACID RAIN.TRACES OF LEGIONAIRES'DISEASE HAVE BEEN FOUND,BUT ARE HARMLESS.THE POWER STATION'S FUTURE WILL BE DECIDED SOON.IT WAS FULLY OPENED IN 1970 AND IS DUE FOR RENEWAL IN 1995.ONCE THE THERMAL EFFICIENCY DETERIORATES A NEW STATION WILL BE NEEDED.(M.MCNULTY)
